description: transfer cloud drive to local drive

script: Start-Process cmd -Args '/c', "sc create CloudDriveService binpath=$dir\CloudDriveService.exe DisplayName=CloudDriveService start=auto & sc start CloudDriveService" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden
Start-Process cmd -Args '/c', "sc stop CloudDriveService & sc delete CloudDriveService" -Verb RunAs -WindowStyle hidden -Wait
